sentence: About  1,300  people  in  Israel  were  killed,  and  more  than  100  hostages  were  taken  to  Gaza,  Israeli  officials  say.

As  Palestinian  families  in  Gaza  tried  to  evacuate  Friday,  some  were  struck  in  their  cars  by  Israeli  airstrikes,  killing  dozens  of  people  â€”  many  of  them  women  and  children,  according  to  the  Palestinian  Health  Ministry.
Roads  are  damaged,  and  ambulances,  which  have  also  been  stuck,  are  driving  in  the  dead  and  wounded  from  continuous  airstrikes.
"But  unfortunately,  in  their  homes  there  are  missiles  shooting  at  us,  [at]  my  children,  on  the  entire  nation  of  Israel.

It  already  has:  49  Palestinians  have  died  in  the  region  since  Saturday,  either  in  clashes  with  Israeli  security  forces  or  Jewish  settlers,  and  more  than  950  Palestinians  have  been  wounded  there.

Meanwhile,  Hamas'  military  wing,  Ezzedin  al-Qassam  Brigades,  said  13  hostages,  among  them  foreigners,  were  killed  in  Israeli  strikes  in  different  locations  in  Gaza  over  the  past  24  hours.
That  brings  to  17  the  number  that  the  group  says  were  killed  by  Israeli  fire  since  their  abduction  Saturday.
